segments.text: Did you have a part-time job when you were still in school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I was way too busy studying all the time . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I worked about twenty hours a week in a pizza restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was always very busy there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I stood behind the register and took pizza orders .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you get any perks on the job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I got to eat as much pizza as I could for free .
segments.speaker: S1
